channel.title: LSE:HSBA on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in LSE:HSBA on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: HSBC Renews Hunt for Chair Amid Struggle to Fill Shortlist, FT Says
item.description: HSBC Holdings Plc is refreshing its search for a new board chairman after it couldn’t find enough satisfactory candidates for a final shortlist, the Financial Times reported Saturday.
